ComicInfo.Title: Beast Heart Strikers: Part 2; Pink
ComicInfo.Summary:
Camera on. Mic check. Put the stream live. Hide the alien artifact that gives you superpowers. Wipe away the tears. And three, two, one…
Series writer KYLE HIGGINS is joined by Twitch superstar MEGHAN “STRAWBURRY17” CAMARENA and iconic artist GOÑI MONTES for a standalone story that reveals the secret origins of Radiant Pink!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-14 00:26:29. [CVDB906522]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/radiant-black-12-pink/4000-906522/
